info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:07PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bradford County through 545 PM EDT... At 507 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sylvania, or near Troy, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, West Franklin, Troy, Overton, Alba, Franklindale, Le Roy, Grover, West Le Roy and Minnequa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania.
